Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.loot.entry

Interface LootModifier<T>

All Superinterfaces:
GenericLootModifier<T>, LootFactory<T>, SimpleLootFactory<T>
public interface LootModifier<T> extends GenericLootModifier<T>, SimpleLootFactory<T>
Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new singleton loot entry. This can also be used as a SimpleLootFactory in which case the default item entry is passed to the apply method.
